alert.note: Alert for Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 12:57PM CDT until May 09 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Talladega County in east central Alabama... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Talladega, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Talladega, Waldo, Alpine, Winterboro, Logan Martin Lake and Howells Cove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
